reason: NO_RULE - insufficient evidence or no valid constraint found
notes: Evidence only describes behavior within a single IE without relating the two fields across different IEs.

meta.evidence: If configured for an SCell, this field contains the ID of the downlink bandwidth part to be used upon activation of an SCell. The initial bandwidth part is referred to by BWP-Id = 0. \\ Upon reconfiguration with reconfigurationWithSync, the network sets the firstActiveDownlinkBWP-Id and firstActiveUplinkBWP-Id to the same value.

full_api_response.predicate: No inter-IE constraint between firstactivedownlinkbwp-id and bwp-id based on provided evidence.
full_api_response.notes: Evidence only describes behavior within a single IE without relating the two fields across different IEs.
